summary: Me: stop comparing Captain Marvel to Captain America. I know they're both blonde military badasses who always try to fight for...
body:
Me: stop comparing Captain Marvel to Captain America. I know they’re both blonde military badasses who always try to fight for what matters but their motivations and characterisation are completely different. Furthermore, one could say that constant forced comparisation takes away from both characters, especially from Carol as we’re yet to see her in action and-

Also me: omfg look at the parallels they could be best friends I see it

blog.name: fandom-artworks
blog.title: Fandom Artworks
blog.description:
Welcome to Fandom Artworks.

Due to recent changes done by Tumblr, Please follow Fandom Artworks on Twitter or Facebook as this Tumblr blog may shut down unexpectedly.

This Tumblr is filled with some of the best fan art of Anime, Cartoons, Movies, TV shows, Comics, Games and many more. I also post artist's original works or original characters. I help artist by posting their artwork here and sharing it with my followers. Most of the artworks are reblog from the artist Tumblr. All artist are credited, tagged and links are provide back to the relevant source.

If you are an artist who wish to submit art here for me to post or reblog, you are welcome to send the links to me by sending a submission. Please click here for the submission guidelines.

This blog is rated PG13 and external web links may also have NSFW content. By visiting, you agree you are 13 or older. To know more about the content that gets posted here, you may view the content guide. By visiting this Tumblr blog, your log data is being recorded using Third Party services to improve this blog. You may view the privacy policy for more info. All fan art that is originated from the media is copyright to their respective creators and artist and all original work art and drawings creations is copyright to their respective artists. You may read the full disclaimer here.

This Tumblr updates on weekends and on some common global public holidays. All post is automated as they are on queue. Please feel free to ask or message me anything if you need more information or have any questions. I reside in Singapore and may be busy working, but I will answer them when I can. Click here for more info on the blog.

blog.name: dear-marvel-studios
blog.title: Dear Marvel Studios
blog.description:
Welcome to the HQ of the Dear Marvel Studios project, a video that will commemorate the end of 10 years of Marvel and the end of an era in the MCU. We will need a massive number of fans to take part in our video so if you're interested in having your voice heard make sure to follow this blog and keep an eye out for future posts! 
*ALL TOPICS ANNOUNCED*

summary: Topic 1:
body:
Topic 1:

Hi everyone! Apologies for the delay. Today we officially announce the first topic for the Dear Marvel Studios project!

Basically what we need you to do is send videos of yourselves discussing our topic to our Google Drive dearmarvelstudios@gmail.com (here is a guide on how to do). In this case you will be discussing…..

Iron Man/Tony Stark!!

Specifically you will be answering these questions:

How did Iron Man influence the MCU?

What were your first thoughts on the Iron Man movie?

What makes Tony Stark such a successful character?

We strongly recommend you stick to our questions but you may include some of your own points. The overall tone we’re going for in this topic is nostalgic and proud so save the emotional stuff for later!

There is no deadline for submitting your entries but remember that the earlier you do the higher the chance it will be edited and used in the final cut. We have made a separate post about rules and guidelines which you can find here. 

Spread the word to your friends and happy recording!

blog.name: dear-marvel-studios
blog.title: Dear Marvel Studios
blog.description:
Welcome to the HQ of the Dear Marvel Studios project, a video that will commemorate the end of 10 years of Marvel and the end of an era in the MCU. We will need a massive number of fans to take part in our video so if you're interested in having your voice heard make sure to follow this blog and keep an eye out for future posts! 
*ALL TOPICS ANNOUNCED*

summary: Entry Rules and Guidelines:
title: Entry Rules and Guidelines:
body:
Please read this post before entering your submission.

Mandatory Rules:

1. All videos must appropriate to be viewed by minors/Marvel Studios representatives.

2. No hate speech/nudity/pushing of idealogy in any way. 

3. Must not be longer than 10 minutes. 

4. No more than two people in one video together.

Guidelines and Suggestions: (The more of these you follow, the higher the chance of your video being featured)

1. Being recording, plan exactly what you’re going to say and stick to it. We really do not want lots of silences and/or filler words (uh…em…yeah…) as this can make editing very choppy. We suggest writing out your ideas to have on hand while recording to keep your video flowing. 

2. Keep the video short and on topic. Don’t ramble! Stay with the questions we give you and try match the tone we would like to set.

3. Speak clearly, look into the camera and be confident. Try not to fidget or stare around the room as this creates a very uncomfortable atmosphere.

4. If you speak a language other than English, Irish or German in your video, please add subtitles. 

5: Have the camera at face-level with a simple background (a plain wall), a reasonable distance away from you. Make sure you sit in roughly the middle of the shot and have adequate lighting. Keep the camera on a stable surface. 

6. Use the highest quality camera you have access to. No amount of editing can fix grainy footage.

7. Preferably do not swear in your entry. 

We reserve the right to exclude any video from the project for any reason we deem fit.

summary: How to upload your entry to us:
title: How to upload your entry to us:
body:
(Make sure your entry is within our rules and guidelines here)

1: Create a Google account so you can access Google Drive. 

2: Go to your Google Drive account and select ‘New’.

3: Select ‘file upload’.

4: Upload your videos to your Drive.

5: Click into your file. 

6: Select the three dots in the top right-hand corner.

7: Select ‘share’.

8: Send your file to to dearmarvelstudios@gmail.com with the topic, your Tumblr URL and any further message you would like to include. 

9: Send your entry and you’re done! Thanks for participating!
